events.name: EV Battery Supply Chain
events.wd_description: The EV battery supply chain involves the production, processing, and assembly of battery components and raw materials globally, with significant regional differences in capacity and dominance.
events.description: The EV battery supply chain involves the production, processing, and assembly of battery components and raw materials globally, with significant regional differences in capacity and dominance.

events.name: China
events.wd_description: China dominates the EV battery supply chain with three-quarters of lithium-ion battery production, 70% of cathode production, and 85% of anode production capacity. It also handles over half of the global processing and refining of lithium, cobalt, and graphite.
events.description: China dominates the EV battery supply chain with three-quarters of lithium-ion battery production, 70% of cathode production, and 85% of anode production capacity. It also handles over half of the global processing and refining of lithium, cobalt, and graphite.

events.name: Battery Cell Production
events.wd_description: China produces three-quarters of the world's lithium-ion batteries, driven by strategic policies and investments.
events.description: China produces three-quarters of the world's lithium-ion batteries, driven by strategic policies and investments.

events.name: Cathode Production
events.wd_description: China holds 70% of global cathode production capacity, a critical component of lithium-ion batteries.
events.description: China holds 70% of global cathode production capacity, a critical component of lithium-ion batteries.

events.name: Anode Production
events.wd_description: China dominates with 85% of global anode production capacity, essential for battery performance.
events.description: China dominates with 85% of global anode production capacity, essential for battery performance.

events.name: Material Processing
events.wd_description: Over half of the global processing and refining of lithium, cobalt, and graphite occurs in China.
events.description: Over half of the global processing and refining of lithium, cobalt, and graphite occurs in China.

events.name: Europe
events.wd_description: Europe is responsible for over a quarter of global EV assembly but has minimal supply chain capacity, with notable cobalt processing at 20%.
events.description: Europe is responsible for over a quarter of global EV assembly but has minimal supply chain capacity, with notable cobalt processing at 20%.

events.name: United States
events.wd_description: The United States has a smaller role in the EV battery supply chain, contributing 10% to global EV production and 7% to battery production capacity.
events.description: The United States has a smaller role in the EV battery supply chain, contributing 10% to global EV production and 7% to battery production capacity.

events.name: Korea
events.wd_description: Korea has significant shares in the downstream supply chain, with 15% of global cathode and 3% of anode material production capacity.
events.description: Korea has significant shares in the downstream supply chain, with 15% of global cathode and 3% of anode material production capacity.

events.name: Japan
events.wd_description: Japan accounts for 14% of cathode and 11% of anode material production capacity, playing a vital role in the downstream supply chain.
events.description: Japan accounts for 14% of cathode and 11% of anode material production capacity, playing a vital role in the downstream supply chain.

events.name: Lithium Cobalt and Graphite Processing
events.description: Over half of the global processing and refining capacity for lithium, cobalt, and graphite is located in China.

events.name: EV Assembly
events.description: Europe is responsible for over one-quarter of global EV assembly.

events.name: Small Role in Supply Chain
events.description: The United States has only 10% of EV production and 7% of battery production capacity.

events.name: Other Battery Components
events.description: Korean and Japanese companies are involved in the production of other battery components such as separators.

relations.wd_description: qualifies something (inception or end of a thing, event, or date) as happening previously to another thing
